windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some new features, bug fixes and improvements:

Bug fixes and improvements:

  • Resolved improper positioning of advanced blocks in RTL language settings
  • Corrected the excessive left margin for lists in Kanban Tasks
  • Enhanced RTL language handling on startup
  • Resolved an issue where Markdown formatting wasn't properly displayed for the initial lines of text in the notes list view
  • Addressed various minor issues

Thanks for all the community feedback! We have a lot more to show, stay tuned.

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love to hear from our users.
